It's a wonderful game, but similarly to League of Legends, it is terribly marred by the vast majority of players who are exceedingly toxic, exploiters who queue with premades to vouch for them after being accused post-game, and developers that take a substantially long time to come around to community feedback, even from creators in their 'Fog Whisperers' program... All things considered, to a new player, DBD is a true horror fan's haven and can quickly become an addictive experience. I do hope BHVR would listen to its community representatives more one day.

All in all, Dead By Daylight can be an immensely rewarding, addictive experience. Yes, you will get mad. It's an asymmetrical horror game, it's inevitable. But you can't have high times - good games - without the bad. 

Great game. Would be even better if the Devs took Fog Whisperer advice to heart.

Very fun and it makes me very angry

I will give this game a positive review.

Pros : 
- Playing killer is super fun, most of them are interesting in ther own way and they're different enough to keep you engaged for a prolonged period of time
- Playing survivor is also fun even though their differences are much more subtle owning more to the differences in perks rather than anything else
-Most of the time theres a pass event running meaning theres always new stuff to get, even people that dont get the pass can still get free stuff included in the event.
- Its a team game, but its a mindset driven game, killers can see 1k games as wins, but they can also only consider only 4'ks wins, i recommend the former. Survivors "winning" on a personal level doesnt depend on them escaping, the rewarding system is based on personal accolades and if you did well and then didnt escape you still get an adequate amount of points for it and the game rewards you accordingly
- New killers and survivors (meaning new perks) every 3 months means a refreshing amount of new stuff relatively frequently

Cons:
- New killers and survivors every 3 months meaning new perks, meaning maybe new OP perks, meaning maybe shitty perks nobody will ever use who knows, the game has a problem of around 9 meta perks being used on every survivor and the rest is not used by anyone who wants to win. If someone does use different perks they're doing it because theyre either testing or arent meta slaves, but in a game based around competition with the other "team" very few people play without the intention of winning
- Toxic players; mostly survivors, teabagging, sticking close to the killer not doing anything just waiting to flashlight at any moment, pallet abuse, waiting at exit gates wasting everyones time just to get that extra teabag or flashlight spam in for no good reason. When killers get fed up and camp/tunnel someone because they want to win (and if the survivors are in a party camping can actually get you a multitude of kills if they aren't running the most meta survivor perks) they (killers) get insulted only because they are doing what the survivors are doing and thats playing to win, to every survivor that acts like this i recommend they play killer for a bit, 10ish or so hours get the feel of it and youll have more understanding
- in Iridescent rank the game doesnt recognize anything but 4k's as wins worthy of ranking up for the killers, which with constant SWF's and meta builds on every survivor is a lottery of massive proportions, needs to be changed to a different system not centered on kills (current system encourages camping and tunneling to get kills and avoid being trashed on by survivors with half a brain cell)
- Some maps are completely unplayable due to insane loops on every corner, badham, rcpd and haddonfield being the prime examples
- increase in hacker activity due to free keys given out on epic
- reporting system pretty much non-existant as it has been proven to only work on chat infrictions and all other things having to be "proven" via video evidence and sent via email to the developers

很好的医疗游戏，治好了我多年的低血压，为什么我要去玩屠夫？各种手电 偷铁 打击 怀表 动不动就是一挂3台 在不守尸的情况下。打个四杀出去问候家人，打个4跑出去NOOB等候。还有门口闪手电嘲讽。我还没挂上就打团了，除了皮脸还能守尸 其他屠夫连树都守不了，反正以后宁愿多排队十分钟也不愿意玩屠夫了。//最后一句，退坑了 感谢116个小时的治疗，现在看开了，有那么多游戏我不玩,我偏偏要高血压是吧。//300小时献给了狗叫，熟练度上来乱杀真好玩//人类直接砍废是吧

This game is first person chess with a rewarding learning curve. Little gorey but other than that I can't recommend it enough.

Also, if you're the kind of person who likes a mental challenge without too high octane of an experience, this is for you. Word of warning, it takes a long time to really understand the game.

С каждым патчем, убивают манов, и по...й что ты купил за бабки нового мана, у которго даже перков нет, мы тебе кинем в пати прокачанных сурвов которые имеют все перки  для выживания. а еще и в пати с дискордом, так что ты будь добр, слей все свои подношения и пососи огромны жирный член на ужин обед или завтрак. Мдааааа.... Игра скатилась, никакого баланса, просто деньги на ветер те кто купил манов в игре, не имея пару прокачанных убийц ., чтобы вкинуть им нужные перки. Хуета игра, если ты хочешь быть маном
